cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product_Manual_I.name: cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product_Manual_Input__c
cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product_Manual_I.description: Stores manual inputs for payment tactic-specific manual inputs.

cgcloud__Measure_Code__c.description: Measure Code under which the manual input is stored in the .json file.

cgcloud__Obsolete__c.description: Obsolete flag of the manual input entry.

cgcloud__Payment_Tactic__c.description: Payment or Tactic combination for which the manual input was entered.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Product for which the manual input was entered. Because the manual input can happen on any level (also, total level), the value of this object can be null.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Input order of manual inputs. It's incremented by 1 for each new entry for a payment or tactic combination.

cgcloud__User__c.description: User who entered the manual input.
